FILTER_TO_CURRENT_USER_COMMENT: boolean, whether to filter the cluster list to the logged-in user.
DEPLOY_ENVIRONMENT_COMMENT: Uses mock APIs when set to 'local': allowed values 'local' and 'prod'.
DEFAULT_PROJECT_COMMENT: Provide a default project for users (populated in cluster creation form).
DISABLE_PROJECT_ENTRY_COMMENT: Boolean, if true, disable project entry for users.
STARTUP_SCRIPT_URI_COMMENT: A 'gs://' path to a cluster init script. If present, this will be provided as the jupyterUserScriptUri param
EXTRA_GOOGLE_SCOPES_COMMENT: Space separated list of google scopes to request in addition to email and profile
